description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Leek & Mushroom Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Leek & Mushroom Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lid and cook for a further 30 minutes or until chicken is falling off the bones. Serve sprinkled with parsley and freshly ground black pepper.
